pages.text: An evolution pool is a fleshy basin filled with mutagenic bile to the brim. Adding flesh lumps and other materials to the bile activates the evolution machine. The mutagenic processes, commonly called mutagenesis, will cause them to fuse together into living amalgamations of fleshy horror.

The resulting creations of mutagen and flesh can be even further transformed by taking them back into the pool and fusing them with other materials, becoming a breeding ground for the most hideous creations imaginable.
